lender.name: rudy
lender.loan_because: At the moment the loan need to change my computer equipment and to purchase a projector for presentations that sell insurance. Because right now you need more staff with better professional and technological tools to cope with competition and new challenges that require the insurance market
lender.occupational_info: Working as an insurance agent and I have 16 years experience in the business. During 10 years working as a clerk in the state insurance company of Costa Rica six years ago decided to work as Insurance Agent

lender.name: Rosalie
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone can afford to be generous.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a microbiology research lab trying to understand how bacteria cause disease and how we can prevent that.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I like micro-lending in it's concept, and love the idea that I can take part in something so wonderful.

lender.name: Cynthia Leavitt
lender.loan_because: My husband Michael and I made this loan to celebrate the birthday of Joyce Leavitt who has spent her life giving to others. Her heart is too big for just one country.

lender.name: Georgina
lender.loan_because: I love and care about people and want to make a difference to this world. We are all the same in the eyes of God and should enjoy the same privileges.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a part time social worker and a student of history. I work with the disabled and with disadvantaged children.

lender.name: Elliot
lender.loan_because: my money does a lot more good in the hands of those who need it than sitting in my bank account
lender.occupational_info: it's amazing i get paid to do what i do

lender.name: shevawn
lender.occupation: cross cultural internship leader and trainer

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: Because it is the right thing to do ... Large banks have hampered developing countries entreprenures in favour of more secure investments with greater returns. How then can these countries grow stronger economies? Small business' drive change, provide opportunity, and create hope. They must be supported.

lender.name: Sean
lender.loan_because: When I needed a loan someone reached out and helped me, so I want to repay the favor.

lender.name: Darren
lender.loan_because: Its good to help

lender.name: Ali Grace
lender.occupation: piritual Life Coach & Goddess Retreats for Women
lender.loan_because: I love the feeling I get when I support another woman. Since I can't be in every country all of the time, at least there is the exchange of funds that can support another where I cannot physically be.
lender.occupational_info: My life purpose is to inspire and help women live from their authentic self through tapping into the power of their feminine essence. It is a gift to this work and to contribute to the women of KIVA!

lender.name: Chrystal
lender.loan_because: No one gets anywhere in life without making the most of their opportunities. I want to make opportunities for others.
lender.occupational_info: I manage teams of computer support personnel.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I crunch numbers.

lender.name: Benoit
lender.loan_because: Finding initial founding can be really challenging for entrepreneur. I want to help entrepreneurs . . .
lender.occupational_info: I'm an entrepreneur that started an IT company from scratch a few years ago. Love the challenges and I want to share my passion ;-)

lender.name: Crystal
lender.loan_because: if you're not part of the solution you are part of the problem.

lender.name: Nehemiah
lender.loan_because: I believe I should

lender.name: Sigma Iota Rho- Wash U Chapter
HumbleAL
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info:
Product Marketing for high-tech for over 20 years.
Enjoy painting wall-murals in spare time

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I want to see people around the world climb up out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I help people to understand God's love for them, and God's desire that they love God and their neighbor as they love themselves.

lender.name: Peter Forsman
lender.loan_because: To generate loans through KIVA, seems like an obvious thing for me to do - make a positive contribution when I can ..
lender.occupational_info:
I am working at the swedish domainregistry .SE, ccTLD for Sweden, where I have the role as Abuse manager and domain specialist.
I run a private blog [internetsweden.se] where I try to make the life as discomfortable I possibly can for scammers and impostors (that I dont have mandate to act against during my working hours).
A large portion of the money to the loans comes from readers showing their "appreciation" for warnings and blog posts I've made on internetsweden.se

lender.name: Lauren and Fraser
lender.occupational_info: Lauren is in grade 8, Fraser is in grade 4.

lender.name: Tifany
lender.loan_because: "For the LORD thy God will bless you as he promised : and you shalt lend unto many nations, but you will not borrow..." Deuteronomy 15:6

lender.name: Carlen
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I think loaning money with 0% interest is the way Jesus would do it.
lender.occupational_info: I run a coffee shop that prepares specialty coffee drinks like espresso and brewed coffee. I am also a college student, husband, and father of two.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I have some excess money and not much to spend it on at this point in my life. This seems like a good way to use my money.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying Russian Language and Literature and International Politics.

lender.name: Randy
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to do so, and anyone that can should. I'd hope that someone else could help me out if I were in a similar situation.

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I like to be able to give other people help when I can. I couldn't have gone to college without student loans.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother of three children. We enjoy learning new things together.

lender.name: Aureene & Mark
lender.loan_because: We give because we have everything we need and more than enough to share.
lender.occupational_info: Aureene is a disability claims manager. Mark is an IT professional

lender.name: topzero
lender.loan_because: Good to be able to help and great to see it makes a difference!

lender.name: Theresa
lender.loan_because: I've been blessed by God and would like to do a little bit for the people He loves.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I am able to help out those who are in need throughout the world. In addition, I know my conributio nis going to a good cause because the recipients know that there is an expectation that the loan be repaid.
lender.occupational_info: I buy things for the US government.

lender.name: Jenifer
lender.loan_because: I believe in reciprocity and that it is my responsibility to share some of what I am lucky enough to have. I generally like to loan to fellow merchants/retailers. Something of kindred spirits.
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell things that no one needs but are fun to have. I love retail and the art of merchandising.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I believe that directly investing in small enterprises can help improve the standard of living for individuals and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I work with the U.S. federal government to invest in and develop people who work in government agencies. I also run the DC Chapter of Net Impact's Service Corps program, which matches volunteer consultants with nonprofits on consulting engagements.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I believe that sustainable small businesses will make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a university library that provides social science data to researchers and politicians so they can help solve social problems.

lender.name: Eduardo L
lender.loan_because: Little by little the world can become a better place.

lender.name: jeff
lender.loan_because: I feel these small loans can and do make a big difference in the lives of others. And not only the borrower but the lenders as well. And frankly I think its fun.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze spatial relationships between objects on the earth and make maps. Hobbies swiming, biking, music.

lender.name: Em & M
lender.loan_because: Without access to credit, people are unable to take economic risks. Kiva has the ability to change the livelihoods of individuals and in doing so, can change the future of nations.

lender.name: Justin Hess
lender.loan_because: I care about progressing the world beyond our differences.
lender.occupational_info: I run reports and lead a very privileged life that at times I've taken for granted. I believe that people are inherently good at heart regardless of the turmoil they experienced in the past. I believe in a new start, and giving a person a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Mazenod 9B
lender.loan_because: We can and the lendees need help
lender.occupational_info: We come to school and study. We are studying Asia at the moment and we wanted to help

lender.name: Shaun
lender.loan_because: I can, and I want to make a difference in the world. I love the simplicity and reach of microfinance.
lender.occupational_info: educator and humanitarian

lender.name: Filip
lender.loan_because: i can

lender.name: Ernest
lender.loan_because: this is a great project

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: it makes perfect sense!

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: The current aid ideology is not working, and microfinance is part of the solution to solving the global poverty issue.
lender.occupational_info: I am an International Politics student.

lender.name: Sachin
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.

lender.name: Nanette
lender.loan_because: It seems like a small thing that can make a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help people solve their problems so that they can become their best self.

lender.name: Wim
lender.loan_because: there is abundance and we all have a right to health, wealth and happiness; sharing resources multiplies them.
lender.occupational_info: raising awareness about the original beneficial design of this world. Practically: protecting people from the impact of electrical devices.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: R. Patterson
lender.loan_because: I believe that the power of generosity and micro-financing can overcome poverty.

lender.name: Kaia
lender.loan_because: Micro-lending is a great way to help people who would have trouble getting finance from traditional sources and I think that starting a successful business and repaying the loan must be very empowering
lender.occupational_info: I deliver mail using a small motorbike in the beautiful northern beaches of Sydney and leafy suburbs surrounding. I like working outdoors.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I believe completely in enabling other people to build up their own businesses, and I think that this is a great way to do it. I have donated to various charities over the years but what I really like about this one is that you can actually see the company and the people that you are lending to. I also really enjoy the updates that you tend to get from the people that you invest in, it's nice to not just give money but be a little more involved with where your money is going!
lender.occupational_info: I am a General Manager for a mid sized firm, so I manage the day to day running of the business and work with a large team of people. Although I do enjoy my work, I would rather it be the weekend where I tend to spend a lot of my time volunteering with my wife at a drop in centre. Work obviously has a place as it is the way to make a living, but I think that a person should really be judged by what they are not paid to do, which is a big reason of why I like this site!

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: I love to share

lender.name: NCFE Finance,Admin&HR
lender.whereabouts: Newcastle upon Tyne Tyne and Wear

lender.name: Jeremias
lender.loan_because: I am an aspiring philanthrope.

lender.name: Greta
lender.loan_because: I was given this as a present and it's so much fun seeing the many times it can be reused and re-lent

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: its better that my money is being used to help ordinary people than sitting in a low interest account helping giant banks.
lender.occupational_info: I make videos for large corporations like hardware chains, stationary stores and supermarkets.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: It is a very good way of helping help themselves. It is not charity.

lender.name: RICHMOND

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: it looks like a good idea
lender.occupational_info: I paint dragons

lender.loan_because: I have the capital to do so and is money well spent!
lender.occupational_info: Investing in young people for a better tomorrow‚Ä¶as it was in the Beginning!

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I love to see people trying to better their lives or the lives of their family. As of today, over the last two years, my initial $25 loan has been paid back and re-loaned 8 times so I've had a little part in helping 8 families up in the world. I try to pick loans which are personal to me, my family or the places I've visited.

lender.loan_because: I have always wanted to own my own Business and i want to help others achieve there dreams.

it makes me feel a little better - and in some way I think this is a great idea.

lender.occupational_info:

lender.occupational_info: Dedicated to the personal development of individuals and the international development of our world.

lender.occupational_info: I work in a service-related field in the environmental controls/building efficiency industry.

lender.name: Sridhar
lender.loan_because: I want to help others becaue I have been helped by others.
lender.occupational_info: As a Real Estate Broker in the states of VA, MD & NC, I have 6 years of experience working with buyers and sellers. I am a member of the National Association of Realtors, the Virginia Association of Realtors and the Northern Virginia Association of Realtors. I have assisted many buyers and sellers with purchasing and selling homes. I believe in taking care of the many details associated with buying or selling homes. I provide great professional service to all clients, buyers or sellers, regardless of their income or the size and price of the home that they are looking to buy or sell. I assist sellers with inspecting their property, suggesting needed repairs and improvements, preparing a comparative market analysis, advising a reasonable estimate of value and marketing their property to achieve the best possible price and terms. I assist buyers with seeking a property at a price and terms acceptable to them and advise them on seeking other professional services related to purchasing a home such as mortgage financing, insurance, surveying, and home inspections. I believe that honesty and loyalty above all else in working with either buyers or sellers.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: The support I receive from everyday Americans is so overwhelming that I wanted to find a way to pass along that generosity to less fortunate people in the world. Kiva allows me to do that!

lender.name: santo
lender.loan_because: It feels great !

lender.name: Socal
lender.occupational_info: All of the raw materials in the lighting industry are bought at the same places. The only difference is which company is the greediest, which I can guarantee is not us. My name is Michael Hanna and I am the owner and founder of SO CAL Lighting. I myself have been in this industry since 1994 and I am never hard to reach if you have any questions or problems with your purchase, or have any questions in general. My brothers David, Joseph and Joshua are also here to satisfy all of our customers by any means necessary. Since we were young, through our strong family values and ethics regarding hard work, we have been providing top notch service that combined makes for over 20 years of quality customer service. May God bless all of us. Socal Lighting PAVER LIGHTING "The day after I placed my order online for your large brass louvered step lights I me and my wife decided we wanted a different color, as we were unsure what we chose online would be the best choice. I called and talked to Michael, who took his time to describe the different finishes in comparison to where we were installing them, and we are VERY happy with the color we chose, they look great!" Bill Handley Kirkland, Washington Sonrise Lights "My raw copper landscape lights look great, and they were easy to set up to my standard line voltage system. Absolutely love 'em!" Charles Edwards Irving, Texas Socal Lighting PAVER LIGHTING "I've been looking everywhere for a good source for Recessed Lighting, and when I ran across your website I was a bit skeptical because the prices were so low. I recieved my order last week and my contractor installed them today, I must say they are truely awesome! Not only am I pleased with the quality and price, but your service was second to none! I will definitely refer and recommend SO CAL Lighting to anyone looking for lighting. I look forward to doing business with you again!" Joeseph Collins Portland, Oregon Sonrise Lights High Ray "I just recieved my copper wall lights, and am amazed with the workmanship. They match well with the nearby bricks and overall landscape of our backyard, and can't wait to watch them petina." Gloria Martinez Medford, Massachusetts Sonrise Lighting LIGHT BULBS "I just received my outdoor landscape lights, spot lights & Transformer I ordered online from you guys. Wow, what was I thinking going to Home Depot for my lighting needs. Your quality and prices blow them away.. You guys are the best!" Gary Turner Bowling Green, Kentucky Read more about: Sunrise Lighting , Sunrise Lights and Socal Lighting Ceiling Fixtures

lender.loan_because: I hope my small contribution can help improve the quality of life for these ambitious people.

lender.name: Dirk-Jan
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky enough to have the means to do it.

lender.name: Birgitte
lender.loan_because: I want to contribute to entrepreneurs success, I believe every talented entrepreneur with a good idea deserves a chance to succeed.

lender.name: Clay

lender.occupational_info: I'm a high school student by day and a machinist by night. I work on a manual lathe and mill making custom metal components.

lender.name: Olga
lender.loan_because: Being able to help someone who just needs a little boost financially is a great feeling.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how to connect to who they really are and that we are all connected.

lender.name: medpathgroup
lender.occupational_info: MedPath Group LLC is a healthcare facilitator in the USA. We are committed to assisting patients in finding high quality weight loss surgeries for affordable prices. Traveling abroad for lapband, gastric sleeve, or gastric bypass surgery saves clients up to 80%.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: I am a current college student paying off college loans, rent, bills, groceries, etc. These expenses don't even compare to the other people around the world who don't have enough money to pay for NECESSITIES like food, clothing, and shelter. Others need money to fuel their small businesses such as farming and agriculture, electronics repair, or simply can't afford necessary supplies for their homes. My expenses simply do not compare to the needs of these people.

lender.name: Komani
lender.loan_because: I like that this helps both others and myself, I have been trying to figure out investing for a while, and i reckon this is a great way to know how the lent money is being used.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Office manager at a company that works to improve the lives of children in New York State.

lender.name: Isy
lender.loan_because: Maya Angelou says....If you learn,teach. If you get, give.

lender.name: Soeren
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves multiple chances in life, as we all do mistakes. Once we've learned, we will succeed. I want others to be able to try becoming successful without having to worry if things don't work out.

lender.name: Jocelyne
lender.loan_because: As a student of anthropology, I've seen a lot of the world's cultures. I have been incredibly lucky in my life, and I hope that by helping people who are motivated and will use the donations well will experience some of the luck that I have received.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: Small acts of kindness make a difference.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to help others. Kiva makes it so easy...one person can really make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: For the most part, I generate reports and analyze data.
